note: Photographer. San Francisco Bay Area. Author of *Los Caprichos: after Goya* (2020), an artist's book of palladium prints and homage to Goya's 1799 *Caprichos*. (Available at spdbooks.org.) Doing lots of watercolor these days. Board member of one of the Bay Areaâ€™s leading classical music ensembles: Voices of Music (voicesofmusic.org). I do a lot of bike riding around town. I'm often scared out of my wits by drivers -- when I'm not being one of them.
